|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = RP-SMA |antenna = |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = Yes |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/24/2014 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00MNOU5W4 |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B00MNOU5W4 |asin_country2 = US |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1244-00000938-50Z_ES", "EW-7811USC V1.0A", and "P/C=D57-111" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ==Links of Interest== [http://www.edimax.us/html/english/frames/b-download.htm Download] *[https://www.raspberrypi.org/forums/viewtopic.php?f=28&t=102323 ''Edimax EW-7811UTC'' on '''raspberrypi.org'''] :See also [[Edimax EW-7811UTC]] ([https://discourse.osmc.tv/t/rc-added-wifi-adapter-support-requests-official-topic/1593/19 7392:a812]).. *[https://github.com/gnab/rtl8812au/blob/master/os_dep/linux/usb_intf.c On '''gnab/rtl8812au''']
